characters.name: Hanako
alt_names: Crazy Knife (クレイジーナイフ)
characters.description:
__Age of Death:__ 13

Hanako is a ghost haunting the old building of Kamome Academy. He resides on the third floor female bathroom, in the toilet of the third stall. He governs over the Seven Mysteries as School Mystery Number 7.

~!Hanako's real name is Yugi Amane. He attended Kamome Academy as a student and his goal was to become an astronaut and go to the moon someday. He was to become a science teacher at Kamome Academy as an adult, but his future changed for unknown reasons. He ended up with the fate of killing his own twin brother, of dying as a kid, and of then becoming one of the Seven Mysteries to protect the students and to fulfill their wishes in order to atone for his sins.!~ 

~!It is hinted multiple times that Hanako has romantic feelings for Yashiro, and that he is madly in love with her.!~

~!He confesses his love to Nene Yashiro and gives her a kiss.!~

characters.name: Nene Yashiro
characters.description: Yashiro Nene is a normal student, and one day she listens to a rumor about ''Hanako-san'' who makes wishes for anyone, but the wishes come with a price. She visits him in the hope of getting her crush to fall in love with her. She becomes friends with Hanako-san soon after meeting him then. She is in the gardening club.

characters.name: Kou Minamoto
characters.description: Minamoto Kou is a student at Kamome Academy's Middle School Division, and a member of a renowned family of exorcists, the Minamoto Clan.

characters.name: Tsukasa Yugi
characters.description:
Yugi Tsukasa is a ghost haunting Kamome Academy. He currently resides at the school's broadcasting club room, with its members Sakura and Natsuhiko.
~!He is the younger twin brother of Amane Yugi. He is said to be the polar opposite of Hanako. Where Hanako grants the wish of a living person, Tsukasa grants the wish of a dead person's lingering spirit!~

characters.name: Sakura Nanamine
characters.description: Nanamine Sakura is a 3rd-year student at Kamome Academy's High School division. She made a contract with Tsukasa and is now bound to him. She is a member of the school's broadcasting club.

characters.name: Teru Minamoto
characters.description:
Minamoto Teru is a 2nd year student at Kamome Academy's High School Division and the school's Student Council President. He is also a member of a renowned family of exorcists, the Minamoto Clan.
Teru is Kou's older brother.

characters.name: Sousuke Mitsuba
characters.description:
Mitsuba, real name Mitsuba Sousuke is a ghost haunting Kamome Academy Middle School's lockers. He was a student at Kamome Academy's Middle School division and a member of the photography club before his death.

~!After being recreated by Tsukasa, he consumed the at-the-time School Mystery No.3's heart and is now the current representative of the 3rd School Mystery!~

characters.name: Akane Aoi
characters.description:
Akane Aoi is a first year student at Kamome Academy's High School division as one of Nene's classmates, and the student council's vice president.
~!He is secretly a supernatural who controls the present, as one of the three Clock Keepers along with Kako and Mirai.!~

characters.name: Lemon Yamabuki
characters.description: Yamabuki Lemon is a first year student at Kamome Academy's High School divison and Nene, Aoi and Akane's classmate.

characters.name: Tsuchigomori
characters.description:
Age: ~!70+!~
Height: 6' 0"+
Occupation: Teacher (disguise), 5th Mystery Representative
Status: ~!Disconnected (as a supernatural)!~

Tsuchigomori is a science teacher at Kamome Academy. He is secretly a supernatural, representing and curating the academy's 5th School Wonder, the 4PM Bookstacks. He is also Kou's current homeroom teacher.

While Tsuchigomori seems like a normal, caring and somewhat meek teacher in his human disguise, he is actually sarcastic, mischievous and quite short-tempered. He's also shown to be quite sadistic, having fun with threatening and scaring Nene and Kou ― although he quickly stops after a light warning from Hanako. Although he is a teacher, he is shown to dislike children because of their noisy attitudes. Tsuchigomori also has an odd sense of humor and likes to joke around, such as saying that he likes to eat human children, only to be met with terrified looks in response.

Despite him claiming that he only pretends to care about his students, he has been shown to actually genuinely care about them on various occasions. When asked why he makes his teacher persona so different than his actual personality as a supernatural, he answers that it's simply because he feels like it. 

~!As the curator of the 4PM Bookstacks, he has access to the entire body of knowledge surrounding the school, along with the present, past, and future. He seems to know everything about every student that has ever attended the school. Even after his yorishiro and boundary were broken, his powers still allow him ways to retrieve the books in the library. He mentions that because of his position, it's possible for him to alter the future, but he does not plan to do so because any curator who does will be erased from existence.!~

characters.name: Yako
characters.description:
The fox statue spirit that holds the title of Number Two of The Seven Wonders (二番目の七不思議. Romaji: _Ni-ban me no Nanafushigi_) as the Misaki's Stair ghost. She took on the form of a beautiful lady inside her territory while outside, she took the form of a kitsune spirit.

~!She spirited humans into her realm in hopes of them making an appropriate vessel for her deceased human teacher, Misaki.!~

characters.name: Aoi Akane
characters.description: Akane Aoi is a first year student at Kamome Academy's High School Division and Nene's friend.

characters.name: Mirai
characters.description: Mirai is a supernatural who controls the future as one of the three Clock Keepers. ~!Kako and Akane are her partners that also work as Clock Keepers.!~

characters.name: Kako
characters.description: Kako is a supernatural who controls the past as one of the three Clock Keepers. ~!He works with Mirai and Akane.!~

characters.name: Mei Shijima
characters.description: Shijima Mei is a former student at Kamome Academy and the current School Mystery Number 4.

characters.name: Natsuhiko Hyuuga
characters.description: Natsuhiko Hyuuga is a 2nd year student at Kamome Academy's High School division. He is a member of the school's broadcasting club.

characters.name: Tannin no Sensei
characters.description: The homeroom teacher of Nene's class.

characters.name: Shinigami-sama
characters.description: School Mystery No.6 is a supernatural haunting Kamome Gakuen on awaiting the moon, a day where several come together to weave baskets without succumbing to sleep. He is currently known as The Reaper from the rumors and guards the boundary closest to the Far Shore. However, he can only appear once each year for this event.

characters.name: Ningyo
characters.description: Mermaid is a high-ranking supernatural in the Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun series. She is able to manifest in Kamome Academy while living underwater with other fish, although it is unclear whether that place is bound to the school.

characters.name: Sumire Akane
characters.description:
Sumire is a character in Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun. She made her debut in Chapter 66 of the manga.

She is part of the Akane family, to which No. 6 stated that they are that kind of family with children who are offered to God (specifically because of their coveted bloodline). Nene suspects that her full name must be Akane Sumire, and her family name has been confirmed by Teru in Chapter 70.

It has not been confirmed whether or not Sumire is Aoi's ancestor yet.

characters.name: Tiara Minamoto
characters.description:
Tiara is the younger sister of Kou and Teru Minamoto, and the eldest daughter of the Minamoto clan. She is shown to be a cheerful girl both in off the bonus illustrations and spin-off manga. She calls the Mokkes cute and doesn't even hesitate to rescue a Mokke from a huge, insect-like monster, hence showing that she isn't scared of the supernatural. 

~!Apparently, her spiritual powers far surpass that of Teru's even in her young age, making her the most powerful member of the siblings.!~

characters.name: Kodama
characters.description: Kodama is known as the Confession Tree and a supernatural that only appears in front of couples and brings all love confessed below it to fruition.

characters.name: Fuji Suzuto
characters.description: Fuji Suzuto is a first-year high school student at Kamome Gakuen that is briefly shown to be in Nene's class and is also depicted to be affiliated with the student council.

characters.name: Katakuri
characters.description: Katakuri was once a human that was sacrificed in a village. He first appeared after saving Nene.

characters.name: Misaki
characters.description:
The namesake of the Second Wonders of The Seven Wonders, Misaki's Stair and supposed teacher of Yako. He is capable of interacting with spirits and ghosts. He died after falling from the stair of a certain shrine.

~!His demise prompts Yako to attempt to recreate a vessel to hold his souls, forcefully enlisting spirited humans she abducted to gather body parts inside her realms and turning them into dolls in the case where they failed to do so.!~

characters.name: Satou
characters.description: Satou is a 3rd year student at Kamome Gakuen's middle school. He is Minamoto Kou's friend and is usually seen together with Yokoo.

characters.name: Yokoo
characters.description: Yokoo is a 3rd year student at Kamome Gakuen's middle school. He is Minamoto Kou's friend and is usually seen together with Satou.
